effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Metamorphosis for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 10 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,099 Agility. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 57,782 Nature damage over 8 sec.

Equip: The gland releases pheromones that attract a Ceaseless Swarm of insects to surround you. Taking damage has a high chance to retaliate against attackers, inflicting 85,896 Nature damage over 6 sec and reducing damage dealt to you by 25,994.

Equip: Taking damage greater than 25% of your health grants you 2,366 Avoidance and increases healing taken by 10% for 10 sec. This effect may only occur every 90 sec.

Falling damage reduced.
Equip: Damaging a target has a low chance to call upon the power of the Blessed Weapon Grip, granting you 10 stacks that increase your highest secondary stat by 185. These stacks fade over 30 sec.
